sentences.en: The foliage was soft and feathery.
sentences.cn: 叶子柔软，有如羽毛一般。

sentences.en: It was so thick, and the foliage so dense, that it was quite fatiguing to proceed.
sentences.cn: 它是那么茂密，树叶是那么稠密，要往前走是很累的。

sentences.en: In the cold winter, daffodil foliage is still lush, full of vitality, to bring people the spring.
sentences.cn: 在寒冷的冬天，水仙花依然枝叶繁茂，生机盎然，给人们送来了春意。
